name: Budget ANC Wireless Headphones
description: Affordable wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 20-hour battery life.

name: Bluetooth Earbuds
description: Compact earbuds with deep bass and fast pairing for gym and commute.

name: Gaming Headset
description: Over-ear headset with noise-cancelling microphone and immersive surround sound for PC and consoles.

name: Premium Studio Headphones
description: Wired studio headphones with high-fidelity sound, ideal for music production and mixing.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof speaker with 12-hour battery, deep bass, and compact design.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with iPhone, Samsung, and Pixel devices.

name: 4-Port USB Wall Charger
description: Compact wall charger with 4 USB-A ports for fast simultaneous device charging.

name: Laptop Cooling Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum stand with dual fans and USB hub for laptop cooling and ergonomics.

name: Smart LED Light Bulb
description: Wi-Fi smart bulb with app and voice control, 16 million colors, and scheduling features.

name: 1080p Webcam with Microphone
description: Plug-and-play webcam with wide-angle lens, noise-reduction mic, and autofocus for video calls.
